alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 15 at 1:18PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Broward County, Coastal Miami Dade County, Coastal Palm Beach County, Far South Miami-Dade County, Inland Miami-Dade County, Metro Broward County, Metro Palm Beach County and Metropolitan Miami Dade. * WHEN...From midnight EST tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms are expected to develop late tonight through early Sunday morning as low pressure develops over the Gulf of Mexico and moves northeast across North or Central Florida. Total rainfall amounts of 3 to 6 inches are possible over the eastern areas of South Florida through early Sunday morning with higher amounts where any showers and thunderstorms train over the same area. This amount of rainfall will lead to some flooding issues over the east metro and coastal areas of South Florida due to the grounds being already saturated from previous rainfall this week. Therefore, a Flood Watch has been issued for the metro and coastal areas of South Florida from late tonight through early Sunday morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
